name: Pingpong API Monitoring
description: Get detailed information about your api end points and monitor their performance!

APP_NAME.description: The url name of your app. Needed to do the keepalive ping.

TO_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: The email address to send alerts to.

FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: The from email address for alert emails.

KEEN_COLLECTION.description: Name of the collection to store the checks in.

HTTP_USERNAME.description: Optional: User name to access the site.

HTTP_PASSWORD.description: Optional: Password to access the site.
